titleStmt.title: W. P. Anderson, Special Orders, No. 203
CWG14275

availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition
Early Access

msIdentifier.idno: Flat Storage Box: 11th Ky Cav (US) Muster Rolls, Bundle 7

body.p:
HEAD-QUARTERS, DEPARTMENT OF THE OHIO.
Cincinnati, Ohio, May 27th 1863.
SPECIAL ORDERS,
No. 203. }
7... The resignation of Lt. and Qr Mr Stephen Stone 11th Regiment Cavalry Kentucky Volunteers, is hereby accepted, to take effect on the twenty=seventh (27th) day of May 1863.

BY ORDER OF MAJOR GENERAL Burnside.
W. P. Anderson
Assistant Adjutant General.

1. 2. 3. 4. 5. 6.
11. Ky Cavy
date of Com. Aug 19. 1862.

11" Cavy
Lt & Qr Mas.
Stone
resig:
Filed May 30. 1863
